long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep tabs on your server's heartbeat with this lightweight monitoring extension.

Automatically ping any server URL at 1-minute intervals to track its availability and response time. Perfect for developers and system administrators who need real-time server monitoring without complex setup.

Key Features

- Simple one-click setup - Just enter your server URL and start monitoring
- Automatic background monitoring through an efficient service worker
- Clean, minimal interface with instant start/stop controls
- Zero configuration needed - works right out of the box
- Minimal resource usage while running in the background

How to Use

- Enter your target server URL
- Click 'Connect' to begin automatic pings
- Monitor your server's availability in real-time
- Click 'Disconnect' anytime to stop monitoring

Perfect for

- Developers testing server deployments
- System administrators monitoring server uptime
- DevOps engineers running availability checks
- Anyone who needs simple server monitoring

Stay informed about your server's status with minimal effort. Download Server Ping Monitor today and keep your servers under watch.
